attributes.action: Create one standardised driving theory test to cover all motor vehicle licence types.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current driver theory tests are purely a money making exercise. 

There should be one standardised theory test which must be passed by all perspective licence holders instead of individual tests for each vehicle type (ie: Motorcycle, Car, HGV etc). 

Passing of this new ‘single standardised theory test’ would then enable the holder to sit the practical test for whichever type of motor vehicle they prefer and also allow them to undertake further practical tests for other types of motor vehicles (within 5 years from date of theory test pass) without the need for sitting another theory test.
Although the test would probably be longer than the present testing process and marginally more expensive the overall quality and actual usefulness of the qualification would be far more beneficial to the driver and to public safety in general as it would provide a much broader scope of knowledge requirement and application.
